snippet.title: The Painter's Apprentice Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist us on steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/780630/The_Painters_Apprentice/

Welcome to the world of The Painter's Apprentice. Paint your way through 7 different art styles while battling enemy paint blobs and platforming your way through obstacles. Coming to Steam May 31, 2018!
